node.text: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: Learn Spanish Fast for Adult Beginners: 3-in-1 Workbook: Master Spanish with 15-Minute Daily Lessons, Practical Exercises, Common Words & Phrases, and Essential Grammar Rules to Live By (Easy Spanish)

node.content-desc: Learn Spanish Fast for Adult Beginners: 3-in-1 Workbook: Master Spanish with 15-Minute Daily Lessons, Practical Exercises, Common Words & Phrases, and Essential Grammar Rules to Live By (Easy Spanish)

Learn Spanish Fast for Adult Beginners: 3-in-1 Workbook: Master Spanish with 15-Minute Daily Lessons, Practical Exercises, Common Words & Phrases, and Essential Grammar Rules to Live By (Easy Spanish)

node.text: Learn Spanish Fast for Adult Beginners: 3-in-1 Workbook: Master Spanish with 15-Minute Daily Lessons, Practical Exercises, Common Words & Phrases, and Essential Grammar Rules to Live By (Easy Spanish)
How customer reviews and ratings work
Looks like this book will make learning Spanish fast and easy.
Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2025

I am very excited about this book. Just got it today. Fast shipping, right on time, we'll packaged. I really want to learn Spanish.... finally. Been wanting to learn Spanish for years. I really think it's going to happen with this book. 15 minutes a day. The book and the...
Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2025

I am a French learning student switching to Spanish for a trip to Spain. I love the systematic approach to the language in this workbook - it is similar in style to my French workbooks making it easy for me to transition.
Report review by Cynthia Ann Pratt
Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2025
Very easy to understand and very helpful.
Learning Spanish can be enjoyable and fun!
Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2025

This is an easy and very good book to follow so people can learn a variety of words and expressions used in Spain which differ from the Latin countries. However, as a Spanish speaker, born and reared in a Latin American country, I notice that I can even add more to enrich...
Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2025
I like the set up of this book. I’m using it along with Spanish lessons and it’s very helpful.
Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2025

Our city library offers free adult education classes. I enrolled in Spanish as a second language. This is our text book. We are through page 68. I find the text clear, the examples cogent and the exercises challenging but fun. Please thank the authors for me.
Learn Spanish fast for adult beginners
Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2025

Quick delivery. Just got it so have not had time to do a helpful review. Product arrived quickly and in new condition as described. It looks like it will work as a convenient easy reference to supplement other Spanish language programs.
Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2025
Love that there are workbook pages included. Really covers the essentials.
Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2025
It's easy to follow and I love the layout! I haven't ever taken Spanish and I can already start to understand things with this book!
Small chunks help reduce feeling overwhelmed
Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2025
Great way to learn a language in manageable chunks as you move through the lessons. The small chunks help reduce feeling overwhelmed.
